name: Rape Treatment Center - CASARC Medical And Forensic Services
description: A team of Physician assistants and nurse practitioners are on call 24/7 to provide care and support to survivors of life altering events, services available at the San Francisco General Hospital Emergency Department for adults and youth. Staff will explain all of your options and support you through the process.
fullDescription: A team of Physician assistants and nurse practitioners are on call 24/7 to provide care and support to survivors of life altering events, services available at the San Francisco General Hospital Emergency Department for adults and youth. Staff will explain all of your options and support you through the process.
whatTheyOffer: The Rape Treatment Center / Child and Adolescent Support Advocacy and Resource Center (CASARC) offers services to all survivors of sexual assault in San Francisco. They are provided with free medical care related to the assault and information about involving law enforcement. Our team of physician assistants and nurse practitioners are on call 24/7 to provide care and support to adult survivors of sexual assault and youth survivors of sexual assault and abuse. Help Reporting to Law Enforcement i
howToGetIt: For counseling / therapy, Contact them at: - Trauma Recovery Center (age 18 and up): 415-437-3000, Monday – Friday 8 AM – 5 PM - CASARC Mental Health Team (Under age 18): 628-206-8386, Monday – Friday 8 AM – 5 PM
address: 2727 Mariposa Street, Suite 100, San Francisco, CA, 94110
keywords: consult a crisis counselor to come to zsfg ed
